trans-unit.source: Provides a wrapper for parsing and building paths to WMI objects.
The following example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Management.ManagementPath> class parses a path to a WMI object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何<xref:System.Management.ManagementPath>類別剖析 WMI 物件的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path that is parsed in the example is a path to an instance of a class.
trans-unit.target: 剖析在範例中的路徑是類別的執行個體的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementPath" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementPath" /> class that is empty.
This is the default constructor.
.NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The object path.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementPath" /> class for the given path.
.NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Management.ManagementPath> class parses a path to a WMI object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何<xref:System.Management.ManagementPath>類別剖析 WMI 物件的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path that is parsed in the example is a path to an instance of a class.
trans-unit.target: 剖析在範例中的路徑是類別的執行個體的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the class portion of the path.
Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> value that holds the class portion of the path.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<see cref="T:System.String" />保留路徑的類別部分值。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 屬性值

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of the class.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含的類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Management.ManagementPath> class parses a path to a WMI object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何<xref:System.Management.ManagementPath>類別剖析 WMI 物件的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path that is parsed in the example is a path to an instance of a class.

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of the <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementPath" />.
The cloned object.
.NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default scope path used when no scope is specified.
The default scope is \\\\.\root\cimv2, and can be changed by setting this property.
Returns a <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementPath" /> that contains the default scope (namespace) path used when no scope is specified.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementPath" />，其中包含未指定範圍時使用的預設範圍 （命名空間） 路徑。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 屬性值

trans-unit.source: By default the scope value is \\\\.\root\cimv2, or a different scope path if the default was changed.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設範圍值是\\ \\.\root\cimv2 或已變更，預設值不同的領域路徑。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is a class path.
Returns a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value indicating whether this is a class path.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<see cref="T:System.Boolean" />值，指出這是否為類別路徑。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 屬性值

trans-unit.source: `true` if this is a class path; otherwise, `false`.
trans-unit.target: `true` 如果這是類別的路徑。否則， `false`。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is an instance path.

trans-unit.target: 傳回<see cref="T:System.Boolean" />值，指出這是否為執行個體路徑。

trans-unit.target: 屬性值

trans-unit.source: `true` if this is an instance path; otherwise, `false`.
trans-unit.target: `true` 如果這是執行個體的路徑。否則， `false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is a *singleton* instance path.
Returns a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value indicating whether this is a singleton instance path.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<see cref="T:System.Boolean" />值，指出這是否為單一執行個體路徑。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 屬性值

trans-unit.source: `true` if this is a singleton instance path; otherwise, `false`.
trans-unit.target: `true` 如果這是單一執行個體路徑。否則， `false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the namespace part of the path.
Note that this does not include the server name, which can be retrieved separately.
Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> value containing the namespace part of the path.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<see cref="T:System.String" />值，其中包含命名空間路徑的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 屬性值

trans-unit.source: A string containing the namespace portion of the path represented in this object.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含的命名空間一部分，表示此物件中的路徑。

trans-unit.target: 屬性值

trans-unit.source: A string containing the full path represented in this object.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Management.ManagementPath> class parses a path to a WMI object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何<xref:System.Management.ManagementPath>類別剖析 WMI 物件的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path that is parsed in the example is a path to an instance of a class.
trans-unit.target: 剖析在範例中的路徑是類別的執行個體的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the relative path: class name and keys only.
Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> value containing the relative path.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<see cref="T:System.String" />包含相對路徑的值。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 屬性值

trans-unit.source: A string containing the relative path (not including the server and namespace portions) represented in this object.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含表示此物件中的相對路徑 （不包括伺服器和命名空間部分）。

trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Management.ManagementPath> class parses a path to a WMI object.

trans-unit.target: 剖析在範例中的路徑是類別的執行個體的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Sets the path as a new class path.
This means that the path must have a class name but not key values.
.NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.target: 完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: Sets the path as a new *singleton* object path.
This means that it is a path to an instance but there are no key values.
.NET Framework Security

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
A new object that is a copy of this instance.
.NET Framework Security

trans-unit.source: Returns the full object path as the string representation.
A string containing the full object path represented by this object.
This value is equivalent to the value of the <see cref="P:System.Management.ManagementPath.Path" /> property.
